data.text: @SteveThePylon @DianaSteele Worked onsite with 2 electricians. The young guy tried to connect two cords with both male ends. He was forever dubbed homo-plug.
@Hoodlum0404 Well this would have been a good time for you then.
@Leon_Cooper I'm going to go ahead and say yes but only because I've recently begun pronouncing pneumonia with a p. All slient letters are fair game now.

@DianaSteele Someone pronounced the p in pneumatic when I went to Nait in 2008. I ran into him again in 2016 and neither of us remembered each other’s name, I referred to him as the P-pneumatic guy. It’s something we can look back at one day and have a good chuckle at it
@DianaSteele I don’t think I’ve ever heard anyone EVER use the p! lol
